movies.title: Good Bad Ugly
movies.cast: Ajith Kumar, Trisha Krishnan, Arjun Das
movies.crew: Adhik Ravichandran (Director), Naveen Yerneni, Y. Ravi Shankar (Producers), G. V. Prakash Kumar (Music), Abinandhan Ramanujam (Cinematography), Vijay Velukutty (Editor)
movies.plot: Good Bad Ugly is a Tamil action thriller starring Ajith Kumar. The film follows an intense narrative of crime and redemption, packed with high-octane action sequences.

movies.title: Veera Dheera Sooran: Part 2
movies.cast: Chiyaan Vikram, Dushara Vijayan, Suraj Venjaramoodu
movies.crew: S. U. Arun Kumar (Director), Riya Shibu (Producer), G. V. Prakash Kumar (Music), Theni Eswar (Cinematography), Prasanna GK (Editor)
movies.plot: Veera Dheera Sooran: Part 2 is a gripping Tamil action thriller. It follows Kaali, played by Vikram, as he confronts his past in a tale of revenge and family ties.

movies.title: Test
movies.cast: R. Madhavan, Nayanthara, Siddharth, Meera Jasmine
movies.crew: S. Sashikanth (Director, Producer), Chakravarthy Ramachandra (Producer), Siddhartha Nuni (Cinematography), T. S. Suresh (Editor), Dhee (Music)
movies.plot: Test is a Tamil sports drama centered around a historic cricket match. It explores life-changing decisions faced by three individuals during a high-stakes game.

movies.title: Perusu
movies.crew: Ilango Ram (Director), Siddharth Vipin (Music), Information not available (Cinematography, Editor, Producer)
movies.plot: Perusu is a Tamil dark comedy revolving around a humorous yet awkward funeral scenario, blending quirky characters and unexpected twists.

movies.title: Kingston
movies.cast: GV Prakash Kumar, Divya Bharathi, Yogi Babu
movies.crew: Kamalakannan (Director), G. V. Prakash Kumar (Music), Information not available (Cinematography, Editor, Producer)
movies.plot: Kingston is a Tamil fantasy horror film about a smuggler who must break a curse in haunted waters, filled with suspense and supernatural elements.

movies.title: Kaadhal Enbadhu Podhu Udamai
movies.crew: Jayaprakash Radhakrishnan (Director), Charles (Music), Balaji Subramanyam (Cinematography), Information not available (Editor, Producer)
movies.plot: Kaadhal Enbadhu Podhu Udamai is a Tamil drama exploring modern love and sexuality, offering a bold take on relationships and societal norms.

movies.title: Kudumbasthan
movies.cast: Manikandan, Priyanka Mohan, Information not available
movies.crew: Rajeshwar Kalisamy (Director), Information not available (Music, Cinematography, Editor, Producer)
movies.plot: Kudumbasthan is a Tamil family drama focusing on the struggles of a middle-class man, blending emotional depth with relatable themes.

movies.title: Dragon
movies.cast: Pradeep Ranganathan, Anupama Parameswaran, K. S. Ravikumar
movies.crew: Pradeep Ranganathan (Director), AGS Entertainment (Producer), Anirudh Ravichander (Music), Niketh Bommi (Cinematography), Pradeep E. Ragav (Editor)
movies.plot: Dragon is a Tamil action thriller directed by and starring Pradeep Ranganathan, following a high-stakes narrative that became a box office hit.

movies.title: Vidaamuyarchi

movies.plot: Vidaamuyarchi is a Tamil action thriller about a husbandâ€™s relentless search for his missing wife, packed with suspense and emotional depth.
